document.full_text: swiss biotech group actelion ltd  is now facing a tougher battle at its annual general meeting next week after a jury decided asahi kasei pharma corporation  should be awarded up to $547 million.
document.title: pressure on actelion rises after asahi case decision
lines_and_colors: swiss biotech group actelion ltd  is now facing a tougher battle at its annual general meeting next week after a jury decided asahi kasei pharma corporation  should be awarded up to $547 million.
